entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
